1112630.name: Lost Vulcan
1112630.description:
Lost Vulcan - A roguelite platformer that revives the spirit of classic arcade games!

The legend of Vulcan is calling you... will you answer the challenge?

In the depths of space lies Vulcan, a colossal abandoned ship that hides legendary riches, deadly traps, and foes that will push even the most experienced bounty hunters to their limits.
